title: 1Password
descriptionMarkdown:
The [1Password](https://www.1password.com) solution for Microsoft Sentinel enables you to ingest sign-in attempts, item usage, and audit events from your 1Password Business account using the [1Password Events Reporting API](https://developer.1password.com/docs/events-api). This allows you to monitor and investigate events in 1Password in Microsoft Sentinel along with the other applications and services your organization uses.

**Underlying Microsoft Technologies used:**

This solution depends on the following technologies, and some of which may be in [Preview](https://azure.microsoft.com/support/legal/preview-supplemental-terms/) state or may incur additional ingestion or operational costs:

-  [Azure Functions](https://azure.microsoft.com/services/functions/#overview

dataTypes.name: Gigamon_CL
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
Gigamon_CL
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
OnePasswordEventLogs_CL
 | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
 | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(7d)

instructionSteps.title: Gigamon Data Connector
instructionSteps.description:
1. Application Metadata Exporter (AMX) application converts the output from the Application Metadata Intelligence (AMI) in CEF format into JSON format and sends it to the cloud tools and Kafka.
 2. The AMX application can be deployed only on a V Series Node and can be connected to Application Metadata Intelligence running on a physical node or a virtual machine.
 3. The AMX application and the AMI are managed by GigaVUE-FM. This application is supported on VMware ESXi, VMware NSX-T, AWS and Azure.
